column1: #text=In the midst of a great and cold winter , the color and feel of the surrounding enviornment had become depressing and lacking of color or warmth .
#text=As the days rolled by and the temperature flirted with hospitable warmth I planned the beginnings of a new spring garden .
#text=One of the new additions would be a fruit tree .
#text=Given the climate here in the south we are blessed with an ability to have both cold and warm types of trees to a certain degree .
#text=This would be a cold tolerant tree .
#text=I took an apple from some time ago that I had chilled seeds in the freezer for .
#text=The chilling of the seeds are supposed to mimick natural coldness and bring forth the seed easier .
#text=I then prepared the soil with fertilizer in a pot and planted the seed .
#text=The tree took off slowly as a sprout and a few years later has about 3 or 4 feet in height .
